safetyTips: We are not asking for signatures and also knock and stand two metres back. We also have special instruction request section on all orders online.
name: BFP Express
description: We are a wholesale bakery supplier, that now offer bakers flour and yeast to everyone. Our bread and cake flour range is large – please visit our site to have a look through – all flour has a long shelf life. We are delivering between 1–4 days of orders being placed.
